content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code washcloth50 for 50% off the original price or use the code washcloth100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support introducing the *parallel universes washcloth* a delightfully simple yet striking knit that s perfect for both beginners and seasoned stitchers looking for a relaxing project worked from corner to corner this washcloth features a clever diagonal construction that creates a sleek parallelogram shape adding visual interest without any extra complexity the easy repetitive stitch pattern makes it an ideal mindless knit for unwinding at the end of the day while the unique shape gives it a modern twist quick to finish and satisfying to make this washcloth might just become your new go-to gift or household staple this beginner-friendly pattern is designed with worsted or aran weight yarn and 5mm us 8 needles but feel free to use any yarn and needle combination you like it s a simple flexible project that you can easily customize to any size by adjusting the number of increases and decreases i ve provided instructions for the exact size i made but you re encouraged to experiment with stitch counts and gauge to suit your own preferences gauge is not crucial in this pattern what makes this washcloth stand out is its unique construction it s worked diagonally from one corner to the other you ll start with a basic cast-on and rapidly increase along one edge forming an asymmetrical triangle once you reach the desired width you ll begin decreasing along the opposite edge shaping the piece into a modern eye-catching parallelogram the design features a clean faux i-cord edging that gives the washcloth a polished structured look the design is simple and soothing to knit made up entirely of garter stitch increases decreases and a faux i-cord edge the only slight variation comes at the cast-on and bind-off where you ll use a couple of easy finishing techniques to add polish to the final piece although the pattern notes right and wrong sides for clarity the finished piece is fully reversible there s no true front or back the final result is a beautifully textured functional washcloth that looks much more complex than it really is it s perfect for beginners or anyone in need of a relaxing satisfying knit best of all it s quick you can finish one in just an hour or two and to make things even easier i ve included video tutorials for any special techniques so you ll have support every step of the way thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it if you enjoyed this pattern you may be interested in some of my other patterns you can check them out here 1 you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please
